chapter.title: Using Luntbuild ANT Task
chapter.para:
Luntbuild comes with an ANT task to automate aspects of the artifact promotion process. To use the task, you need the following jars in the ANT classpath
hessian-3.0.8.jar
luntbuild-api.jar
jsch-0.1.34.jar
luntanttask.jar
Hessian and Lunt jars can be found in the "remoting" directory. Jsch is available here.
Currently, LuntDeployTask only supports deploying artifacts from the latest green (successful) build.

section.title: Declaring the task
section.para: Use the taskdef declaration to declare the Lunt task.

section.title: Using the deploy task
section.para: Deploying a published Luntbuild artifact can be done with the deploy task
section.programlisting: <target name="example.deploy"> <deploy luntUsername="luntuser" luntPassword="luntpassword" luntServer="http://your-luntserver:8080" project="myLuntProject" schedule="myLuntProject" artifact="myArtifact.ear" deployUsername="foouser" deployPassword="barpassword" deployServer="your-server" deployDir="/deployDir"/> </target>
section.para: If deploying on the same machine that invokes the ANT task, than the isLocalDeploy attribute can be used
section.programlisting: <target name="example.deploy"> <deploy luntUsername="luntbuild" luntPassword="luntbuild" luntServer="http://your-luntserver:8080" artifact="IBSPlatform.jar" project="IBSPlatform" schedule="IBSPlatform_schedule" isLocalDeploy="true" deployDir="/temp"/> </target>

section.title: Using the deploy task in a macro
section.para: If many artifacts need to be copied/deployed, than a simple ANT macro can lighten the amount of duplication in your ANT script
section.programlisting:
<target name="example.macro"> <deploy-to-env artifact="someEJBz.jar" /> <deploy-to-env artifact="myWebApp.war" /> <deploy-to-env artifact="datasource.xml" /> </target>
<macrodef name="deploy-to-env"> <attribute name="artifact"/> <sequential> <echo>Copying @{artifact} to some environment</echo> <deploy luntUsername="luntuser" luntPassword="luntpassword" luntServer="http://your-luntserver:8080" project="@{project}" schedule="myLuntProject" artifact="myLuntSchedule" deployUsername="foouser" deployPassword="barpassword" deployServer="your-server" deployDir="/deployDir "/> </sequential> </macrodef>
